slider.overview:
Item Of Interest Detail Page

This page displays the detail in the Item Of Interest feed. The Item Of Interest can be an Event or a POI, such as an Attraction or Hotel.

feed.name: Item Of Interest
feed.overview: Calls the Item Of Interest feed by using the itemOfInterestId in the request.

feed.name: Destination Menu
feed.overview: Calls the Destination Menu feed by using the itemOfInterestId in the request.
